testsuite.name: com.automation.tests.RescheduleFunctionalityTest

testcase.name: verifyCandidateToAdvertiserRescheduleFlow
testcase.system-out: [Step 1] Clicking on Login button... [Step 1] Clicked on Login button successfully. [Step 2] Logging in as Candidate... [Step 2] ✅ Candidate logged in successfully. [Step 3] Clicked on My Interest tab. [Step 4] Internship card located for: Designer0009 [Step 5] Clicked on Reschedule icon. [Step 6] Clicked Next Month button. [Step 7] Selected first active date. [Step 8] Selected first available time slot. [Step 9] Clicked Continue to confirm reschedule. [Step 11] Navigating to advertiser portal: https://stagebusiness.promilo.com/login [Step 11] ✅ Advertiser logged in successfully. [Step 12] Navigated to My Prospect > Internships. [Step 13] ✅ Reschedule request accepted successfully. ===== ✅ Full Reschedule Flow Completed Successfully (Candidate → Advertiser) =====

testsuite.system-out: [Step 1] Navigating to Candidate Portal: https://stage.promilo.com/ [Step 1] Clicking on Login button... [Step 1] Clicked on Login button successfully. [Step 4] Internship card located for: Designer0009 [Step 5] Clicked on Reschedule icon. [Step 6] Clicked Next Month button. [Step 7] Selected first active date. [Step 8] Selected first available time slot. [Step 9] Clicked Continue to confirm reschedule. [Step 11] Navigating to advertiser portal: https://stagebusiness.promilo.com/login [Step 11] ✅ Advertiser logged in successfully. [Step 12] Navigated to My Prospect > Internships. [Step 13] ✅ Reschedule request accepted successfully. ===== ✅ Full Reschedule Flow Completed Successfully (Candidate → Advertiser) =====
